DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study characterize change IOP 24 hour selective trabeculoplasty SLT ( 1 6 month treatment , decrease IOP , type rhythm , mesor , acrophase , amplitude ) . The secondary objective evaluate change ocular perfusion pressure ( arterial pressure - IOP ) ocular blood flow optic nerve head selective laser trabeculoplasty .
DOC.brief_title: PIO Laser Sclerectomy IOP SLT Sclerectomy
DOC.criteria: Primary OpenAngle Glaucoma IOP 21 mmHg Progression maximal medical therapy age 18 year Pregnant woman
